img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Coronavirus Update
img.p: HPS is working with Wayne RESA ISD, following the recommendations of the Center for Disease Control (CDC) and the Michigan Department of Health and Human Services regarding the coronavirus. The safety of our students and staff is a priority and we will follow all recommendations accordingly. All schools at HPS will remain open and we will proceed with all scheduled plans until further notice.
